query:
ALTER TABLE player_upgrades
  ADD COLUMN statName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN statIncrease INT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN newStatValue INT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN metadata TEXT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute ALTER TABLE player_upgrades
  ADD COLUMN statName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN statIncrease INT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN newStatValue INT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN metadata TEXT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL;
